# Pull Request – AFEOL Project

Thank you for contributing to the AFEOL Project.  
Please complete all sections below to ensure the pull request can be reviewed quickly and safely.

---

## 1. Summary

**What does this PR change or add?**  
(Write a short, clear summary.)

---

## 2. Related Issue

If this PR addresses an issue, reference it:  
e.g., `Closes #12`, `Fixes #7`  
(Otherwise write: N/A)

---

## 3. Type of Change

Select all that apply:

- [ ] Bug fix  
- [ ] New feature  
- [ ] Security improvement  
- [ ] Documentation update  
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup  
- [ ] Other (explain below)

---

## 4. Implementation Details

Describe the changes in detail:

- What exactly was changed?  
- Why was the change necessary?  
- Any possible risks or side-effects?  
- Any security implications?

(Write here)

---

## 5. Testing

**How was this change tested?**

- [ ] Local testing  
- [ ] Docker environment  
- [ ] Tor/I2P environment  
- [ ] Automated tests  
- [ ] Manual verification  
- [ ] Other (explain below)

Describe the testing process and results:  
(Write here)

---

## 6. Checklist (must be all YES)

Before submitting, confirm the following:

- [ ] Code follows the AFEOL Coding Standard  
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed  
- [ ] No sensitive data included  
- [ ] No telemetry, tracking, or analytics  
- [ ] Changes respect privacy and anonymity principles  
- [ ] No JavaScript added (except minimal tooling if discussed)  
- [ ] English is the primary language of added text  

---

## 7. Additional Notes (optional)

(Anything else maintainers should know)

---

## 8. Reviewer Notes

(Leave empty — for maintainers only)
